verbs.description: [ARG0: russians] to [V: go] [ARG4: to heaven] [ARGM-MNR: in a nuclear attack] putin says if russia is ever attacked with nuclear weapons the russian victims will go to heaven as martyrs says russian president vladimir putin who made the comments thursday during the annual valdai discussion club in sochi the afp reports as for the aggressors in an attack on russia putin us vladimir putin president russia
